thread.section_title: SecureDataRecovery.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SecureDataRecovery.com | securedatarecovery.com
thread.title: Michael Prystowsky

author: Michael Prystowsky
title: Michael Prystowsky
text: Mac mini with all family photos was backed up by a RAID drive. The RAID drive crashed and before I could replace it the Mac mini failed. Secure data recovery walked me through the process of recovering my data by assessing both units and developing a cost effective plan for recovery. They were responsive and customer oriented. I recommend them highly.
